name: formfiller-dev-setup
description: Development-only monorepo setup for FormFiller packages

scripts.build:libs: npm run build:types && npm run build:schema && npm run build:validator
scripts.build:all: npm run build:libs && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:libs: npm run test:schema && npm run test:validator
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint -w formfiller-types -w formfiller-schema -w formfiller-validator -w formfiller-backend -w frontend --if-present

author: Vivi and Sam <lowcoders@protonmail.com>
